name: William PETRAS, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (USX CORPORATION)
name_abbreviation: Petras v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

parties: William PETRAS, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (USX CORPORATION).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
CAPPY, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel K. Bricmont, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Martha R. Conley, William J. McKim, Pittsburgh, for USX Corp.
casebody.head_matter:
655 A.2d 504
William PETRAS, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (USX CORPORATION).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 7, 1995.
Decided March 28, 1995.
Daniel K. Bricmont, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Martha R. Conley, William J. McKim, Pittsburgh, for USX Corp.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
